rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: When Account and Opty are populated

value.stringValue: "Greetings " + BLANKVALUE([SBQQ__Quote__c].SBQQ__PrimaryContact__r.FirstName, TRIM([SBQQ__Quote__c].SBQQ__Account__r.Name))+"," +br()+br()+br()+"Thank you for the opportunity to provide pricing and product details."+br()+br()+"The following pages include detailed product and pricing as requested."+br()+br()+"We look forward to supporting you and this opportunity."+br()+br()+br()+br()+br()+"With best regards," + br()+br() +$User.FirstName + " " + $User.LastName + br() + $User.Title + br() + $User.Email

formulas.name: formula_9_myRule_8_A1_0282740904
formulas.expression: "Greetings " + BLANKVALUE({!myVariable_current.SBQQ__PrimaryContact__r.FirstName}, TRIM({!myVariable_current.SBQQ__Account__r.Name}))+"," +br()+br()+br()+"Thank you for the opportunity to provide pricing and product details."+br()+br()+"The following pages include detailed product and pricing as requested."+br()+br()+"We look forward to supporting you and this opportunity."+br()+br()+br()+br()+br()+"With best regards," + br()+br() +{!$User.FirstName} + " " + {!$User.LastName} + br() + {!$User.Title} + br() + {!$User.Email}
